TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientChannelSink implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase

summary.span: 提供用戶端通道接收所需的功能和屬性。

span.span: Provides required functions and properties for client channel sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道接收提供外掛程式的點，以允許存取的基礎訊息通過通道，以及使用傳輸機制將訊息傳送至遠端物件的資料流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收鏈結中的通道接收提供者連結在一起，並且所有通道流經這個鏈結的訊息流程之前序列化和傳輸。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before they are serialized and transported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明實作介面。The following code example illustrates an implementation of the interface. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/clientsink.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/clientsink.cs#20)] 請參閱介面對應的用戶端接收提供者實作的範例文件。See the interface documentation for an example of the corresponding client sink provider implementation.
